title: Welcome to My Website
text:
Hello! My name is Celeste Tan Jia Yu, and this is my personal website. Here, you can explore my projects, learn more about me, and read my reflections. I hope you enjoy browsing through it!



Music is an essential part of my life, and I’d like to share one of my favorite songs with you!











Yishun is a vibrant neighborhood located in the northern part of Singapore. It is well-known for its rich cultural diversity and its welcoming community.
The neighborhood is home to a variety of amenities, such as parks, shopping malls, and recreational centers, making it a convenient and enjoyable place to live. Yishun has a unique charm, blending modern urban development with pockets of greenery and natural beauty.
Residents of Yishun also enjoy easy access to transportation, ensuring seamless connectivity to other parts of Singapore. It’s a neighborhood filled with character and warmth, offering a balance of city convenience and suburban tranquility.







I am also Indonesian Chinese. Indonesia is a country rich in cultural diversity and natural beauty. Growing up as part of this unique cultural blend has shaped my perspectives and values. It has also inspired my passion for learning and connecting with people from various walks of life. Explore Indonesia on the map below:

title: Reflections
text:
GenAI has been a huge part of my learning journey, like a mentor who guides me like teaching me the basics and improving my skills along the way, it also breaks down complex topic for me which helps me digest it faster I mostly use the AI, Chatgpt which I find the most reliable. Additionally it also helps me in identifying bugs if I make any. Though it might not be fully understanding of everything as it might not be good in everything like designing or doing a whole application. But it does help me understand better and guide me when I am in need of small tasks which really helps me alot in my studies and the way I do learning now.

title: Who Am I?
text:
Who Am I?
My name is Celeste Tan Jia Yu, and I am passionate about data science, technology, and storytelling. I enjoy working on projects that make data insights accessible to everyone.


Technical Skills







Category
Details




Computer Maintenance and System Administration
Proficient in computer maintenance and system administration tasks.  Operating Systems: Ubuntu (Linux)


Networking
LAN and Wireless networking expertise.  Cisco Packet Tracer for network simulation.


Programming Languages
Advanced Java, Python (Wing IDE), .NET (Visual Studio), JavaScript, MySQL, C# (Visual Studio), Solidity (blockchain development)


Database Programs
Proficient in managing databases using MySQL and Oracle Database.


Networking Programs
Experienced in network analysis using Wireshark.  Cisco Packet Tracer for network simulation.


Virtualization
Experience with VMware virtualization.


MS Office Suite
MS Word, MS Excel, MS PowerPoint


Methodology
SDLC (Software Development Life Cycle), BPMN (Business Process Model and Notation), UML (Unified Modeling Language), Agile methodology, RAD (Rapid Application Development)


Software Packages
SAS (Statistical Analysis System)






Achievements

2023: Octava Foundation Scholar
2022: Director’s Roll of Honour
2022: Top 10 Finalist of the iDare Entrepreneurial Challenge 2022 (December to February)
2021 – 2022: Participant of EMPOWER AI for Girls (10 Sessions from October to February)
2021: Participant of the PolyFintech Hackathon 2021
2019 – 2020: Howe Yoon Chong PSA Scholarship
2019 – 2020: Chip Eng Seng Grant
2019: Participant for Girls Capture the Flag Competition

title: Projects
text:
Role: Member
Skills: C language
Year: 2023
Collaborated with a dynamic team to develop a comprehensive Clinic Appointment Scheduling System using both ArrayList and LinkedList data structures to assess their comparative performance. The system provides users with efficient management capabilities, allowing for operations such as: - Displaying all appointments - Inserting new appointments - Querying specific appointments - Updating appointment details - Deleting appointments - Saving appointment data to a file
Robust error-handling mechanisms are integrated to ensure a reliable user experience. The user-friendly interface enhances the overall experience, ensuring smooth navigation through various functionalities.







Role: Leader
Skills: Python (Selenium, BeautifulSoup, Pandas, CustomTkinter, Matplotlib, CSV, etc.)
Year: 2023
Collaborated with a dynamic team to develop a comprehensive HDB property analysis GUI. The application not only provides insightful data analytics but also simplifies the property selection process through efficient web scraping, offering users a multifaceted tool for well-informed decision-making.
Key Features: - Predictive pricing models: Users can forecast property prices. - Interactive data analytics charts: Provide a visual understanding of market trends. - Export charts in PNG format: Enhances user convenience.







Role: Member of the FYP team
Skills: Java, Firebase, JavaScript, Spring Boot, Google Chrome Extension Development
Year: 2022
Led weekly sessions with my FYP team from April 18 to August 2 to address the rising threat of internet phishing links. My team developed a web application utilizing a Google Chrome Extension, providing users with a safeguard against phishing scams. Despite the challenges, our project excelled, securing a spot among the top two projects in the cohort.
